title: Calories in Sovereign Blanc Wine
meta_description: Discover calories in sovereign blanc, a crisp white wine, including carbs, alcohol content, per 100 ml basis, and serving tips for 150 ml glass.
assumptions: Dry white wine from Sovereign Blanc grapes, 12% ABV, standard 150 ml serving size, no added sugars.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by producer, vintage, sweetness level, and serving size. Check bottle labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 150 ml glass of Sovereign Blanc wine has ~123 kcal, mostly from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of sovereign blanc?
faqs.a: About 123 kcal for a standard 150 ml glass of dry Sovereign Blanc.
Yes, ~1.4 g carbs per 150 ml glass, mostly from residual sugars.

faqs.q: Is sovereign blanc low in calories compared to red wine?
faqs.a: Similar to many dry whites; ~82 kcal per 100 ml, often less than sweeter wines.

faqs.q: What affects calories in sovereign blanc?
faqs.a: Alcohol content, sweetness, and serving size; dry versions are lower in calories.

faqs.q: Calories per 100 ml of sovereign blanc?
faqs.a: Approximately 82 kcal per 100 ml for a typical dry white wine.
